text: Abramov () is a rural locality (a khutor) in Mikhaylovka Urban Okrug, Volgograd Oblast, Russia. The population was 278 as of 2010. There are 23 streets. == Geography == The khutor is located on the Bezymyanka River, 29 km from Mikhaylovka and 180 km from Volgograd. == References == Category:Rural localities in Mikhaylovka urban okrug
title: Abramov, Volgograd Oblast
